results.name: a(n) = Sum_{d divides n} d*(n/d)^(d-1).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
program: (PARI) N=66; x='x+O('x^N); Vec(sum(k=1, N, x^k/(1-k*x^k)^2)) \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Sep 03 2019
results.author: _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Nov 05 2009
